entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain overnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm except 20 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
